alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 10:36AM CDT until May 18 at 8:12AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Rio Grande At Laredo affecting Webb County. For the Rio Grande...including Columbia Bridge, Laredo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rio Grande At Laredo. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, or 2.4 meters, minor lowland flooding occurs. Flow reaches the lower sections of the customs parking lot in Laredo. && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Rio Grande Laredo 8.0 1.9 Sat 10 am 3.9 4.5 6.8 8.8 4.4 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 145 AM CDT.
